short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Highlight specified words for research on the current page

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Luminator is a chrome highlighter extension aimed at letting you specified words and phrases to be highlighted in your chosen colours. This helps you identify sets of grouped words more easily. Our aim is to enable people to find the information they need in an accessible format.

You can set the words you want to luminate on the page from the options popup, accessible by right clicking on the icon. Once you have configured the wordlists, you simply click the icon on any website that you would like to luminate. Then you will see the words on the page highlighted in your chosen colours.

To undo the highlighting simply refresh the page.
